## AuthContainer.requestPhoneVerification() method

Requests user phone SMS verification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestPhoneVerification(phone: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phone | <code>string</code> | Registered phone number of the user |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
